title: Angie Kent reveals the one thing she FEARS after watching Matt Agnew's series of The Bachelor
text:
She'll begin her hunt for love when The Bachelorette launches on October 9.

And days before her series begins, Angie Kent has revealed just what she's learned from Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor - which ended weeks ago.

During a candid interview with 10 daily, the 29-year-old confirmed her biggest fear is watching the show back, now she's finally found happiness.

She's nervous! Angie Kent (pictured) has revealed what she learned from watching Matt Agnew's series of The Bachelor, as her journey to find loves airs in a matter of days

Angie said: 'I'm going to see a lot of stuff that I probably wish I saw in the moment, and I only get to see it now.

'So that's probably one thing where I was like, wow.... him [Matt] watching that, he never would've known what the girls were talking about, and that's what's going to happen to me.'

Despite her fears, Angie has confirmed she is still very much in a relationship with her champion after filming commenced weeks ago.

True love! Matt Agnew (right) found love with Chelsie McLeod (left) during The Bachelor last season, but it wasn't the easiest ride for the pair

'I'm totally glad I did it. I've learnt so much about myself,' said the former Gogglebox star told OK! Magazine.

When asked if she proposed during the finale, Angie confirmed that didn't happen.

'No I'm not into it [women proposing to men]' she insisted.

She's found the one! Despite her fears, Angie has confirmed she is still very much in a relationship with her champion after filming commenced

'I've never planned a wedding, even though a lot of girls do when they're younger,' she added.

Angie, who appeared on I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here! earlier this year, was announced for the show in March.

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday, October 9 at 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: She'll begin her hunt for love when The Bachelorette launches on October 9.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
